title: Final report on the Mansi and Fure rivers alluvial gold prospecting project
series: Archive report / Ghana Geological Survey Department -- no. 66, 2nd ed.

notes.value: The authors wrote the report in 1965 but was unpublished.

by_statement: by P. Burnette and J. Hickey (Mansi River) and D. Marszalek and H. Paul (Fure River).
contributions: Ghana Geological Survey. Archives Rehabilitation Unit.
